Title: Eni to install a second floating LNG liquefaction plant in Congo
Description: Italy’s Eni signed a contract with China-based Wison Heavy Industry to install a second floating LNG plant offshore the Republic of Congo. The country will join the group of African LNG exporters with the launch of its first floating plant next year.
Author: DE

Title: US expands export permits for Sempra’s Mexico-based LNG projects
Description: The US Department of Energy expanded the export permits for Sempra Infrastructure’s Mexico-based projects, allowing them to export to countries that do not have free trade agreements with the US. This is meant to help the Indo-Pacific region diversify supplies while transitioning away from coal.
Author: DE

Title: Germany’s Lubmin floating LNG terminal receives permit for test phase
Description: Germany’s Lubmin-based floating terminal received a special permit for a test phase and aims to start commercial operations as soon as possible upon successfully testing the infrastructure and receiving the necessary permit for commercial operations.
Author: DE
